definition: Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10

sentences.english: So they went in to make sacrifices and burnt offerings.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶和約拿達進去，獻平安祭和燔祭。

sentences.english: So Jehu son of Jehoshaphat, the son of Nimshi, conspired against Joram.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，寧示的孫子，約沙法的兒子耶戶背叛約蘭。

sentences.english: In the seventh year of Jehu Jehoash began to reign; and forty years reigned he in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶第七年，約阿施登基，在耶路撒冷作王四十年。

sentences.english: Jehu said, 'Come with me and see my zeal for the Lord .' Then he had him ride along in his chariot.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶說，你和我同去，看我爲耶和華怎樣熱心。

sentences.english: Then they blew the trumpet and shouted, 'Jehu is king!'
sentences.chinese: 他們吹角，說，耶戶作王了。

sentences.english: When the messenger arrived, he told Jehu, 'They have brought the heads of the princes.'
sentences.chinese: 有使者來告訴耶戶說，他們將王衆子的首級送來了。

sentences.english: In the seventh year of Jehu, Joash became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem forty years.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶第七年，約阿施登基，在耶路撒冷作王四十年。

sentences.english: 'If so, ' said Jehu, 'give me your hand.'
sentences.chinese: 耶戶說，若是這樣，你向我伸手，他就伸手。

sentences.english: In the seventh year of Jehu, Joash became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem forty years.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶第七年，約阿施登基，在耶路撒冷作王四十年。

sentences.english: So Jehu rode in a chariot， and went to Jezreel； for Joram lay there.
sentences.chinese: 於是耶戶坐車往耶斯列去，因爲約蘭病臥在那裏。

sentences.english: ' 'What do you have to do with peace?' Jehu replied.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶說，平安不平安與你何干。

sentences.english: And there came a messenger, and told him, saying, They have brought the heads of the king's sons.
sentences.chinese: 有使者來告訴耶戶說，他們將王衆子的首級送來了。

sentences.english: Thus Jehu destroyed Baal out of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，耶戶在以色列中滅了巴力。

sentences.english: And Jehu followed after him， and said， Smite him also in the chariot.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶追趕他，說，把這人也殺在車上。

sentences.english: The driving is like that of Jehu son of Nimshi-he drives like a madman.
sentences.chinese: 車趕得甚猛，像寧示的孫子耶戶的趕法。

sentences.english: And he said, Put them in two heaps at the entrance of the gate until the morning.
sentences.chinese: 耶戶說，將首級在城門口堆作兩堆，擱到早晨。
